Name: _LanguageNative
Comment: Language name in the native language

Name: _LanguageCode
Comment: standard windows os language code this pack represents (can be primary code only ie. en or primary-secondary ie. en-GB)

Name: ZGFP_Path
English: Path to the gml_fmt executable is not set or invalid.
Translation: Path to the gml_fmt executable is not set or invalid.

Name: ZplGmlfmt_Path_Tooltip
English: Make sure the build you choose is compatible with 2.3 projects!
Restrictions: tooltip when you hover over the path box

Name: ZplGmlfmt_OnSave
English: Run gml_fmt after every project save?
Translation: Run gml_fmt after every project save?

Name: ZplGmlfmt_OnSave_Tooltip
English: Enabling this feature may annoy you due to buggy FileWatcher.
Restrictions: tooltip when you hover on the onsave checkbox
